name: Prototype 12 (Dream Productions, toast, RandomAmbler, Mia, Crystal, endi)
name_original: Prototype 12 (Dream Productions, toast, RandomAmbler, Mia, Crystal, endi)
description:
Prototype 12 was made for a Final Major Project of this teams' 2nd year of College.

Prologue

A 3D puzzle escape game where you wake up in a rundown factory from a deep sleep. 

With no memory of what happened before you fell asleep, you realize you aren’t yourself. 

Instead, you’re a robot with an arm that grants the power of teleportation, escape is now your number one priority!

Controls

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Jump: "Space"
  • Crouch: "Left Ctrl"
  • Blink: Mouse click (on surface)
  • Object Pick Up & Down: "E"
  • Object Throw: Left Click
  • Press ALT + F4 to exit the game!

Social

If you enjoyed the game and would like to support us more, please feel free to follow our Social Media accounts and take a look at our website!

Twitter

Instagram

Website

How To Install

  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on your desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click prototype-12.exe
  • Escape the factory!
